content: each scale at the center double_crochet into the chain space of the marked scale then reverse the pattern double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet smoothing the sides between back strap and neck strap working on right side attach to row 1 of neck strap slip_stitch down to scale working on back loops work a single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet on first scale repeat down each scale once you hit the back strap slip_stitch twice and fasten_off repeat on other side straps and strings 1 make a 3 ft chain and lace it through the neckline 2 take an arms length of yarn and fold it in half working with a larger hook g/4 25mm pull the folded loop through a strap tip and use the doubled yarn to create a long chain repeat at all four strap tips steam block and you re finished~
